messages.content: Please be polite, concise and informative.
It is Sunday. Please greet me in a unique and fun way!

SUN-DAY-Funday!

Hey there, Superstar! It's your favorite day of the week - SUNDAY Funday! Time to unwind, recharge, and get ready for an amazing week ahead! What are your plans for today?
Please tell me 2 facts about Gettysburg, Pennsylvania.
